thread.title: BRIEF-China Internet Nationwide Financial Services Signs System Development Agreement For Convey Project

title: BRIEF-China Internet Nationwide Financial Services Signs System Development Agreement For Convey Project

organizations.name: brief-china internet nationwide financial services signs system development ag
china internet nationwide financial services inc

text:
44 AM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-China Internet Nationwide Financial Services Signs System Development Agreement For Convey Project Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 31 (Reuters) - China Internet Nationwide Financial Services Inc: 
* CHINA INTERNET NATIONWIDE FINANCIAL SERVICES INC. SIGNS SYSTEM DEVELOPMENT AND CONSULTING AGREEMENT FOR THE CONVEY PROJECT 
* CHINA INTERNET NATIONWIDE FINANCIAL SERVICES SAYS UNIT SIGNED COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH ZHONGHUHANG (BEIJING) INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
